title: how can you tell which champions are available to get chests
body:
I know this question has been asked before but the info available seems to be out of date 
I hover my mouse over the champion in my collection tab and there is no obvious indicator on champions I'm sure I have gotten their chests for and champs I'm sure that I haven't and nothing on any other champs either

replies.body:
or just check out champion mastery lookup. here is your profile

http://championmasterylookup.derpthemeus.com/summoner/?summoner=jigglejigglwoosh&region=OCE

You're in the right spot in Collections! If you don't see anything about chests in the popup when you hover over a champion, then you probably haven't gotten a chest for them this season yet! I went ahead and took a screenshot of my own client, and you can see how it should look when you **HAVE** gotten the chest for that champion.

https://i.gyazo.com/ccfeaa359f644b2206f64d84e3dcc633.png

I wish i could know this while in champ select

While Riot does not have a method for doing this, a simple trick would be to take a screenshot of your Collections page and save it as an image file. Then you just pull it up during champion select and know which champions are still chest-eligible.
